assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Lawrence Kirschner has a patent on the identification of the PRKAR1A gene (Carney complex; United States Patent 6,759,525 Stratakis, et al. July 6, 2004). There are no additional conflicts of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was reviewed and approved by The Ohio State University (OSU) Institutional Review Board. This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki.
